description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan

condition participants received – observers were required to watch a  demonstration (ie from the first touch of the door until hand insertion) before they were allowed to manipulate the apparatus. Upon fulfillment of this requirement - demonstrators left the room- observers were given access to the apparatus. Three conditions- full model: conspecific demonstrators showed observers the opening of the box  / ghost control : experimenter swung the door in or  out by pulling on nylon strings attached to the box / Baseline: participants were given access to the apparatus without prior information
whether the demonstration observed was pull or push action
the strategy the participants follow to open the box – whether it matches the demonstration or not
time it takes to perform the action in seconds
